akn:section.akn:heading: Policy regarding identification of gender or personal pronouns in official correspondence

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 986. Policy regarding identification of gender or personal pronouns in official correspondence The Secretary of Defense may not require or prohibit a member of the armed forces or a civilian employee of the Department of Defense to identify the gender or personal pronouns of such member or employee in any official correspondence of the Department. (Added Pub. L. 118–31, div. A, title V, § 522(b), Dec. 22, 2023, 137 Stat. 249.)
